skills.name: Magstorm Surge
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 18s] Unleashes a downward cleave that generates an EM storm to knock down enemies within the AOE, dealing 2,333 Lightning DMG and making them conductive. Conductive enemies receive 50% more Lightning DMG for 7s.

skills.name: EM Cleaver
skills.description: Attacks deal an additional 80 Lightning DMG, and further gain 30% Crit Rate against paralyzed enemies.
